long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PhoneQR gives you a QR code you can scan with your mobile device to call or message any phone number on the screen.

Hover on any phone number on the screen to get its QR code!

------------------------------
Version history
------------------------------

v0.1.2
- Improved the QR code preview box behaviour
- Added an instructions page

v0.1.1
- Added greater customisability (e.g. disable auto-detection, send to WhatsApp)

v0.1
- Initial version
